Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 10:30 PM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: W 25 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
